entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
